nodes.text: Wullffwarro was a male silverback Wookiee Chief who fought in the Clone Wars and was later taken as a slave by the Galactic Empire. He owned an Auzituck anti-slaver gunship.

Wullffwarro was a Wookiee Chief from the planet Kashyyyk. Prior to the rise of the Empire, Wullffwarro served alongside the Galactic Republic during the Clone Wars, and also fought in the Battle of Kashyyyk. Fourteen years after the Empire came to power, Wullffwarro and his son, Kitwarr, were taken from their homeworld to be forced laborers in the spice mines of Kessel. Not long after being delivered to Kessel, he, Kitwarr and a group of Wookiees were rescued by the rebel crew of the Ghost.  In gratitude, Wullffwarro offered to help the Rebels in any way he could. He later flew an Auzituck anti-slaver gunship.
